summary: The diff shows that the Teachers component has been updated to reference new image paths for all three teacher profiles (Sonali Ma'am, Abhijit Da, and Santanu Sir). The images are correctly pointed to '/assets/generated/sonali-maam-photo.dim_400x400.png', '/assets/generated/abhijit-da-photo.dim_400x400.png', and '/assets/generated/santanu-sir-photo.dim_400x400.png'. However, there is no evidence in the diff that these image files were actually added to the frontend/public/assets/generated directory. The ADDED FILES section shows 'none', which means the actual image assets are missing from the implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the three generated teacher photos as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files. The Teachers component references the new image paths, but the actual image files (abhijit-da-photo.dim_400x400.png, santanu-sir-photo.dim_400x400.png, sonali-maam-photo.dim_400x400.png) were not added to the frontend/public/assets/generated directory.
